bio:
I am a freelance article writer. I have written for various clients. I write original articles, do blog posts, rewrite articles so these pass off as  new content, and I do editing and proofreading tasks as well. 

I know the importance of SEO, back links, keywords, keyword density and good online research for each writing project assigned to me.

I am honest about my work, and professional in dealing with clients. I guarantee quality articles that pass copyscape. Absolutely no plagiarism. 

I function with minimum supervision, and follow instructions set by my clients.

My topics revolve around fashion, home, hobbies, health, how-to-articles,women interests, education, lifestyle, scrap booking, product reviews and similar non-technical subjects.

Please check my work here:

 http://EzineArticles.com/?expert=Evelyn_Lalisan

I managed a client's blog site for two years from June, 2011 to August 2013. I wrote daily blogs and posted these to the client's WordPress site. I uploaded videos/images related to the topic, created links, keywords, meta tags and tags. Please refer to link below; Previously, my name appeared on the blog site, but owner currently posted articles as written by admin. My supervisor was Mary Case of Afuro Hair and Beauty Products.

http://www.wigs-tastic.com.uk

I am also into some writing gigs. I did some articles for a wedding site, English learning site and an online dating site.

I just finished a year's work for Tom Wessin, as article writer for one of his websites.

I can work Monday to Friday. I am open to full time work- 8 hours; or part time work of 4-5 hours a day.

I can submit 3-5 500 word articles a day. I can submit articles with 24 hours.



I am open to a rate per article or bulk work, as long the pay commensurates to my experience as a writer.

I get paid through PayPal, Western Union or direct bank deposit. Client shoulders all fees.

I would likely ask for a down payment before accepting work. Client pays all fees- Guru, PayPal, wire transfers, Xoom, Western Union, etc..

Nonetheless, I am open to negotiations about salary and rates, as long as things are fair to both client and writer.

abstrac: We-Can-Do-Anything.com was created to help individuals and businesses tackle those prickly strategic, production or technical problems that can’t always be dealt with internally.
bio:
We can turnaround an enormous range of projects in double quick time and at minimal cost.

You will be assigned an experienced and knowledgeable account manager who will take your brief and will supervise the process end-to-end, liaising with you at every step of the task. You may even have direct contact with the expert who is working on your project, depending on the intricacy of the task.

We have vast experience across many disciplines, and we can execute a wide range of complex projects with considerable insight and precision.

We work with all types of organisations from start-ups, sole traders and SMEs - right through to multinational enterprises.

We-Can-Do-Anything.com is the brainchild of entrepreneur Paul McCarthy who spent decades working in senior roles at advertising agencies (Saatchi and Saatchi -10 years, Grange/Interfocus -15 years) and media consultancies in the UK – subsequently building a number of successful retail and commercial enterprises in Europe and the Far East.


During his career Paul came to recognise that businesses often require access to additional resources to complete ‘overspill’ or ‘non-core business’ projects - and carefully set about building a company of individuals to fill that void.

We-Can-Do-Anything.com aims to be the premier ‘go-to’ commercial resource, to support the growth and development of your business. 

Satisfaction guaranteed.
We operate 24 hours a day. 50% prepayment the remainder on completion and sign off by client.
